page.title: 03GIRSBY _ People & Services
page.content: { Population est. at 13 (4 children of whom 2 go to school at Ludford).Res_ _idents include a farmer and family, 2 retired people, young couple with 2 small children and one privately owned house empty & for sale. Originally these houses were for servants at the 'Big House'. Sewage by Septic Tanks & Water from 2 springs by old Victorian Ram Pumps. Infrequent Buses a mile away so that 5 out of 6 households own cars and all on telephone. Main elect_ _ricity: Post delivered by van and collected from roadside box.One person has Kidney problems & on Dialysis machine for which N.H.S. has installed 2 underground tanks with water for emergency use in view of unreliable supply. Hospital treatment means 65 mile journey to Sheffield. Library Van and Refuse Collection weekly _ Doctors at Wragby, Binbrook & Market Rasen.
